content.title: Brutal Fighters
content.tagline: The downfall of a dystopian T.V. show

content.paragraph:
Brutal Fighters is a 2D Beat 'em Up developed using Unity by a team of nine people, including Game Designers, Gameplay Programmers, Game Artists, and a Sound Designer. It was created as the final project of our second year in the Bachelor of Game Design program at ISART Digital.
This game was developed over a period of two and a half months, with four weeks dedicated to full production. Despite the tight schedule, we successfully crafted a unique experience that stood out for its technical achievements and creativity.

The game earned us both the Technical Direction Award and the Grand Jury Prize, a testament to the hard work and collaboration of our team. We take great pride in Brutal Fighters, a game that blends reality TV themes, unexpected surprises, and a juicy gameplay experience within a vibrant, offbeat Mexican-inspired world.
